tweet: Georgia is a top 10 solar state, with policies that have encouraged utility-scale solar farms. But it’s ranked 40th in the country for rooftop solar. This disjointed standing is only made worse by a state-imposed limit placed on a popular solar program.   https://t.co/kDnAQAYGeW
name: Inside Climate News

tweet: As farmers go against the grain to take up sustainable practices, economic incentives and policies still favor large industrial farms. Experts say the need for sustainable farming has never been greater, citing its key role in tackling climate change.   https://t.co/peCSoN8LFB
name: Inside Climate News

tweet: It’s disturbing that the Secretary of Agriculture’s position on the step-up in basis is so out of touch with reality. The Biden Administration’s tax hike proposals will decimate family farms in Illinois.  The Biden Administration must abandon its disastrous policies for farmers.
name: Darin LaHood
